Name: objid
Description: SDSS id, unique to each galaxy

Name: subject_id
Description: id unique to each simulated image

Name: sim_evolution
Description: evolution value used when artificially redshifting

Name: automag_err_i
Description: error in apparent I-band magnitude of image (SExtractor)

Name: automag_err_v
Description: error in apparent v-band magnitude of image (SExtractor)

Name: petromag_err_i
Description: error in I-band petromag of image (SExtractor)

Name: petromag_err_v
Description: error in v-band petromag of image (SExtractor)

Name: r50
Description: radius containing 50% of the light of image (SExtractor)

Name: r90
Description: radius containing 90% of the light of image (SExtractor)

Name: mu_max_i
Description: I-band surface brightness of max pixel (SExtractor)

Name: mu_max_v
Description: v-band surface brightness of max pixel (SExtractor)

Name: u
Description: u-band apparent magnitude of source galaxy

Name: g
Description: g-band apparent magnitude of source galaxy

Name: r
Description: r-band apparent magnitude of source galaxy

Name: i
Description: i-band apparent magnitude of source galaxy

Name: z
Description: z-band apparent magnitude of source galaxy
